device.name: frequency_bus
device.documentation: The <class>frequency_bus</class> class implements a bus that distributes a frequency to a set of targets. Targets subscribe to the bus via the <iface>simple_dispatcher</iface> interface, and frequency changes are distributed to subscribers via the <iface>frequency_listener</iface> iface. The distributed frequency can either be generated by the bus itself, or be fetched from a different object (e.g., from another frequency bus). The input frequency can optionally be scaled before it is distributed.
